title: LivinHell: The Demon Writings Of William Pauley III
description: This is a collection of works by sci-fi/horror author William Pauley III. Included in this - Mr. Malin and the Night (novella) A man sells his soul to the Devil for a final night of revenge! - The.Living.Daylights. Poetry and prose. - If You Don't Sleep, You Don't Dream. (novella) A man discovers the horrible secrets behind his scars! - Extras A collection of works that have previously been published in magazines including shorts such as THE LUMP and THE 612 FINGERS OF A STRANGE, WICKED MAN.
author: William Pauley III
